original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, posts as p, votes as v, users as u WHERE u.Id = p.OwnerUserId AND p.Id = v.PostId AND p.Id = c.PostId AND p.Score>=0 AND p.Score<=16 AND p.ViewCount>=0 AND p.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-09 12:00:50' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.Reputation>=1 AND u.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-07-19 19:08:49' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-08-28 12:15:56' AS TIMESTAMP)
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments

CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE CAST(posts.Score AS INTEGER) >= 0 AND CAST(posts.Score AS INTEGER) <= 16 AND posts.ViewCount >= 0 AND posts.CreationDate <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-09 12:00:50'
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E3 AS SELECT * FROM E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E2.Id=E3.PostId)

CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE users.Reputation >= 1 AND (CAST(users.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-19 19:08:49' AND CAST(users.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-08-28 12:15:56')
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E3E4 AS SELECT * FROM E2E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E2E3.OwnerUserId=E4.Id)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E3E4 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2E3E4 WHERE E1.PostId=E2E3E4.Id)
